attributes.contentHtml: As I can see, every falixnodes kissass started spawning in here, protecting their mighty dad. Y'all just try to solve shit in here, but everyone knows that y'all are just some staff and that y'all simp on Pamar/Lamaker/ItzAwesome/Lily or what name does he have at this moment. History is history, and nothing can change that. He already warned me for "gay picture" => homophobe, he already scammed me in the past and nothing can be changed.

mituishere you said I've scammed you twice, lets see
1) you say I've scammed you for designer role (does it even mean scamming?)
2) you say that I scammed you again WITH FRICKING WHAT?
